title: Hernö Gin flip
creator: Hernö Gin
instructions: Pour Hernö Gin, simple syrup and one whole egg into a shaker. Shake everything without ice. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a chilled glass.

title: LET’S CALL IT A SPRITZ
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
ingredients: 6 cl Sparkling Wine or Pet Nat (Erik used Lindenlaub - Apres l’Heure PetNat)
instructions: *Honey Water: Honey in equal parts of warm water (chilled). Shake all above, follow by straining into your favorite high ball glass with tons of ice. Enjoy!

title: Bee’s knees
creator: Hernö Gin
instructions:
Shake Hernö Gin, honeywater and fresh lemon juice with ice for about 8 seconds. Strain into a coupette glass or cocktail glass. 
To make honeywater, dissolve two parts honey in one part warm water.

title: Pickled Midsummer
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
ingredients: A dried dill sprig for garnish
instructions: Shake the above with ice and double strain into a Nick & Nora glass, garnish with dried dill. *The pickle juice is made from the botanicals of our Akvavit - juniper berries, angelica root, coriander seeds, heather, elderflower, caraway & fennel seeds, that are mixed together with water, apple cider vinegar and sugar.

title: Stockholm Calling
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Mix everything on ice in a highball glass. Top up with the soda. Garnish with your summer flower of choice.

title: Tom Collins
creator: Hernö Gin
instructions: Add Hernö Old Tom Gin, fresh lemon juice and simple syrup in to a highball glass. Fill the glass with ice, top it up with soda and give it a nice quick stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge

title: Hernö Basil Smash
creator: Hernö Gin
ingredients: 1 bunch basil leaves, more than you think
instructions: Place basil leaves and lemon juice in a shaker, gently muddle (smash) and top of with the rest of the ingredients. Shake vigorously and double strain into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with a couple of basil leaves.

title: Puffran
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a coupe glass and squeeze a piece of orange zest over the glass.

title: Hernö Gin flip raspberry
creator: Hernö Gin
instructions:
Pour Hernö Pink BTL Gin, raspberry syrup* and one whole egg into a shaker. Shake everything without ice. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a chilled glass. 
*Raspberry syrup: Just cook 500 g. sugar and 500 g. water to a syrup. Add 250 g. raspberries and let it rest for three hours. Strain. Ready to use.

title: Svart & Tonic
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Pour Svart and tonic water over tons of ice in a good looking glass. To spice it up, garnish with a slice of lemon or orange.

title: The Negroni Warmer
creator: Hernö Gin
ingredients: freshly grated orange rind or nutmeg
instructions: Pour Hernö Old Tom Gin, Antica Formula Vermouth, Carpano Botanic Bitter, water and sugar into a saucepan. Heat. Pour into a glass. Top with whipped cream and freshly grated orange rind or nutmeg

title: Lilla Bleckan
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Mix everything except the cream. Pour into four smaller glasses and top with lightly whipped cream. If available, sprinkle some Nigella seeds on top.

title: B(l)ackflip
creator: Stockholms Bränneri
instructions: Shake Svart, bourbon, heavy cream, simple syrup and the egg in a shaker filled with ice, then double strain into a glass. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

title: Ramos gin fizz
creator: Hernö Gin
ingredients: 2 dash Orange Flower Water egg white from a whole egg soda water
instructions: Mix everything except the soda water in a shaker and shake it for about 1 minute. Then again and again. Add ice. Shake again and again and again. Pour 30 ml of soda water slowly to a highball glass and start building your Ramos. Let it take time, don’t stress, a Ramos takes time. Strain a little bit more. Are you done? Probably not. Add more soda to the shaker to get more froth. Are you done? Maybe. You decide.
